snippet.title: 6  Telemetry as Part of ‘Done’
snippet.description:
📡 Shipping Without Telemetry Is Flying Blind
🎥 Episode 6 of 10 — Now Playing

You shipped it.
But… is anyone using it?
Is it working?
Is it broken?
📉 If you don’t know—then you’re flying blind.
No logs.
No metrics.
No visibility = No feedback = No learning = No value.

🚫 Telemetry isn’t a nice-to-have.
✅ It’s a non-negotiable.

At NKD Agility, we help teams bake telemetry into the Definition of Done:
📊 Usage data
⚙️ Performance metrics
🚨 Behaviour signals
🔎 Outcome validation

Because until you're gathering real data, you're guessing.
And if you're guessing, you’re not delivering real value.

🎯 Let’s stop flying blind after release. Visit https://www.nkdagility.com

👇 Watch now. Follow for the full 10-part series.

#Telemetry #Observability #DefinitionOfDone #DevOps #AgileDelivery #EngineeringExcellence #NKDAgility #MartinHinshelwood #RedefiningDone #ShipWithConfidence
